items: I propose a fully custom-built, responsive, and high-performance corporate website, hosted independently with open-source technologies on a self-managed VPS. This digital solution will replace the client's legacy WordPress site with modern web architecture that prioritizes speed, security, and scalability.

The new site will embody contemporary UI/UX principles, optimal SEO structure, exceptional load times, and a scalable architecture designed for both effective business promotion and meaningful stakeholder engagement.
